Fact.Name: Form 1099-DIV Collection
Fact.Description: Collection of all Form 1099-DIV dividend income reports received by the taxpayer

Fact.Name: Payer Name
Fact.Description: Name of the entity that paid the dividends

Fact.Name: Payer TIN
Fact.Description: Taxpayer identification number of the payer

Fact.Name: Ordinary Dividends (Box 1a)
Fact.Description: Total ordinary dividends reported in Box 1a of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Qualified Dividends (Box 1b)
Fact.Description: Qualified dividends reported in Box 1b of Form 1099-DIV, eligible for preferential tax rates

Fact.Name: Total Capital Gain Distributions (Box 2a)
Fact.Description: Total capital gain distributions reported in Box 2a of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Unrecaptured Section 1250 Gain (Box 2b)
Fact.Description: Unrecaptured section 1250 gain reported in Box 2b of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Section 1202 Gain (Box 2c)
Fact.Description: Section 1202 gain reported in Box 2c of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Collectibles (28%) Gain (Box 2d)
Fact.Description: Collectibles (28%) gain reported in Box 2d of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Section 897 Ordinary Dividends (Box 2e)
Fact.Description: Section 897 ordinary dividends reported in Box 2e of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Section 897 Capital Gain (Box 2f)
Fact.Description: Section 897 capital gain reported in Box 2f of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Nondividend Distributions (Box 3)
Fact.Description: Nondividend distributions reported in Box 3 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Federal Income Tax Withheld (Box 4)
Fact.Description: Federal income tax withheld reported in Box 4 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Section 199A Dividends (Box 5)
Fact.Description: Section 199A dividends reported in Box 5 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Investment Expenses (Box 6)
Fact.Description: Investment expenses reported in Box 6 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Foreign Tax Paid (Box 7)
Fact.Description: Foreign tax paid reported in Box 7 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Foreign Country or U.S. Possession (Box 8)
Fact.Description: Name of foreign country or U.S. possession reported in Box 8 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Cash Liquidation Distributions (Box 9)
Fact.Description: Cash liquidation distributions reported in Box 9 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Noncash Liquidation Distributions (Box 10)
Fact.Description: Noncash liquidation distributions reported in Box 10 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Exempt-Interest Dividends (Box 11)
Fact.Description: Exempt-interest dividends reported in Box 11 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Specified Private Activity Bond Interest Dividends (Box 12)
Fact.Description: Specified private activity bond interest dividends reported in Box 12 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: State Tax Withheld (Box 13)
Fact.Description: State tax withheld reported in Box 13 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: State (Box 14)
Fact.Description: State reported in Box 14 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: State Identification Number (Box 15)
Fact.Description: State identification number reported in Box 15 of Form 1099-DIV

Fact.Name: Total Ordinary Dividends
Fact.Description: Sum of all ordinary dividends from all Form 1099-DIV reports, reported on Form 1040, Line 3b

Fact.Name: Total Qualified Dividends
Fact.Description: Sum of all qualified dividends from all Form 1099-DIV reports, reported on Form 1040, Line 3a

Fact.Name: Total Capital Gain Distributions
Fact.Description: Sum of all capital gain distributions from all Form 1099-DIV reports, used in Schedule D calculations

Fact.Name: Total Federal Tax Withheld from Dividends
Fact.Description: Sum of all federal income tax withheld from all Form 1099-DIV reports

Fact.Name: Total Foreign Tax Paid on Dividends
Fact.Description: Sum of all foreign tax paid from all Form 1099-DIV reports, used for foreign tax credit calculations

Fact.Name: Total Section 199A Dividends
Fact.Description: Sum of all section 199A dividends from all Form 1099-DIV reports, used in qualified business income deduction calculations
